<h1 align="center">
  Screensaver + Gatsby + Google Sheets
</h1>

A Gatsby app that cycles through content pulled from Google Sheets.  

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1. First run `npm install`
2. The  run `gatsby develop` (You'll need the .env file which I have locally)
3. You're done!

## What's in the project

React front end, static site builder (Gatsby), Google Sheet intergration, SCSS

## Project features

Random node order each refresh, random pastel background each refresh, flickity intergration, scss.
